resources.string: Welcome and thank you for downloading Balloon Season! \nThis tutorial will explain the objectives and instructions to this game.

The objective of this game is to score as many points as possible within a time limit. This is done by popping as many balloons as possible. Balloons will appear from the bottom of the screen and will continue to ascend before they go off-screen. Make sure you pop those balloons before they get a chance to escape!

To score a lot of points, it is important to accumulate combos. This is done by popping certain coloured balloons in a certain order. Consider the colour wheel on the top right corner. If you pop a balloon of a certain colour, you must pop either the same colour or one of the colour adjacent to the last colour.
Below are example sequences of colours you can pop to achieve a combo.
You also need to be quick with your combo as it does decrease with the time not spent on getting combos. Messing up on a combo also leads to a penalty to your combo count!
There are two game modes: Arcade Mode and Rush Mode. Arcade Mode lasts 90 seconds while Rush Mode lasts 60 seconds.
Arcade Mode features temporary weather effects that changes the gameplay. For instance, the snow effect will cause all of the balloons to ascend slower and stops the timer.
Another weather effect is the sun. Here only balloons of the same colour are produced, making it a lot easier to rack up combos.
The final weather effect will not make you happy. It is the fog, which deliberately clouds your vision and you may not be able to see the balloons\' colour properly.

That covers Arcade Mode. Rush Mode does not feature weather effects so it is mainly a mode where you can test your ability to rack up combos. However, balloons appear in greater numbers and at a much high frequency, so you really need to be quick!
That is it for the tutorial. Thank you again for downloading Balloon Season and I hope you enjoy the game!
